title: The ball A comedy, as it vvas presented by her Majesties Servants, at the private House in Drury Lane. Written by George Chapman, and Iames Shirly.
author: Shirley, James, 1596-1666.
publisher: Printed by Tho. Cotes, for Andrew Crooke, and William Cooke,
notes: In fact probably by James Shirley alone.
The authors' names are bracketed together on the title page.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
